section.heading: Any reference to the Greater Avenues for Independence program or (GAIN) shall mean the welfare-to-work activities under the CalWORKs program provided for in this article

content.p: Welfare and Institutions Code - WIC DIVISION 9. PUBLIC SOCIAL SERVICES [10000 - 18999.98] ( Division 9 added by Stats. 1965, Ch. 1784. ) PART 3. AID AND MEDICAL ASSISTANCE [11000 - 15771] ( Part 3 added by Stats. 1965, Ch. 1784. ) CHAPTER 2. California Work Opportunity and Responsibility to Kids Act [11200 - 11526.5] ( Heading of Chapter 2 amended by Stats. 1997, Ch. 270, Sec. 49. ) ARTICLE 3.2. Welfare-to-Work Activities [11320 - 11329.5] ( Heading of Article 3.2 amended (as added by Stats. 1990, Ch. 1568) by Stats. 1997, Ch. 270, Sec. 59. ) 11320. Any reference to the Greater Avenues for Independence program or (GAIN) shall mean the welfare-to-work activities under the CalWORKs program provided for in this article. (Repealed and added by Stats. 1997, Ch. 270, Sec. 61. Effective August 11, 1997. Operative January 1, 1998, by Sec. 183 of Ch. 270.)

authorialNote.p: (Repealed and added by Stats. 1997, Ch. 270, Sec. 61. Effective August 11, 1997. Operative January 1, 1998, by Sec. 183 of Ch. 270.)
